CustomField.description: Checkbox to indicate that a patient's member plan should be set to active. Triggers the member plan to be stamped into the PJN_Primary_Member_Plan__c, PJN_Secondary_Member_Plan__c, or PJN_Tertiary_Member_Plan__c case fields (depending on member plan's PJN_Coverage_Order__c value) and sets the PJN_Active__c checkbox on the member plan to TRUE.
CustomField.label: Set as Active
